en.text: - Launched the initial Personal Portfolio Website built from scratch to showcase commercial projects.

en.title: Website Design & Development Training
en.text: - Spent over a year designing and tweaking the portfolio website, using it as a playground for development training and experimenting with various visual elements.

en.title: Matrix Arcade Integration
en.text: - Developed the Matrix Arcade Games on the side, inspired by the movie trilogy, and integrated interactive game features into the portfolio.

en.text: - Developed and launched the AiTomatic Prototype, with the model currently in its prototype phase.

en.title: Design Overhaul & Project Consolidation
en.text: - Performed a comprehensive design and tech stack overhaul: concatenated projects, implemented CDN delivery, and streamlined all web content to enhance the personal portfolio.
